UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Cholesterol-conjugated stapled peptides inhibit Ebola and Marburg viruses in vitro and in vivo.
Literature.Author: Pessi A, Bixler SL, Soloveva V, Radoshitzky S

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:50% Cytotoxicity=>=25 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Ebola virus EBOV(IC50 I=1.90±0.28µM),Ebola virus EBOV(IC90 I=9.44µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(50-60% Cytotoxicity=>25µM),Ebola virus EBOV-GP PsV(IC50 E=0.60±0.20µM),Ebola virus EBOV-GP PsV(IC90=6.15µM),Marburg virus MARV-GP PsV(IC50 E=8.45±1.49µM),Marburg virus MARV-GP PsV(IC90=33.36µM)
